LE MAELSTRÖM 

A short lifestyle video ad collaboration between eco-tourism brand Buddha Ventura and Haven creative studio for Le Maelström eco-luxe and sustainable cabins near Québec City. Capturing a unique above the clouds glamping experience at an altitude of 550 meters. With dramatic landscapes, solar-powered and gas-heated amenities the cozy breathtaking getaway experience at the Lagöm cabin lives up to its Swedish influence of not too much, not too little but just enough.
